body:
Hi,
i'm  trying to update OpenBSD's WIP port of Bitcoin to the latest 0.10.1rc2 and noticed that libsecp256k1.\* is not installed when make install is called.

After reading [Automake/Directories](http://www.gnu.org/software/automake/manual/automake.html#Directories), i think we should use SUBDIRS instead of DIST_SUBDIRS to call recursive targets like install correctly? :confused:

Below is the output before/after applying this patch.

Cheers,
Fabian
